title: Kayn missions
body: I got a friend who's uncertain if you could get both Kayn and Rhaast icons and is sorta discouraging him from playing the champ, so a little clarification for him should help

replies.body: You should be able to complete both missions in any order. Doing one of those missions won't lock you out of doing the other.
i didnt get a single mission yet.
thought i only have to play with/against one?
Well I never had the missions and I own the champion.
I have to complete the 3 missions as Kayn to get the icon?
> Hi, for some weird reason my Kayn missions haven't popped up in my missions, am I supposed to own Kayn to complete the mission?
Yes at first I didn't know this either but yes you have to own him
Problem, Thats not true. I just did the missions of both Shadow and Darkin. Both arent showing.
You can earn both icons if you complete the 2 [missions](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/unleash-kayns-carnage-earn-2-special-icons).
